message: Let's start with a fair split, and we can adjust in future rounds if needed.
You were too generous in round 1, let's see if you'll be more reasonable now
I'll meet you halfway, but I think I deserve a bit more since I'm the one making the offer now.
You're still being too soft, I'm not going to get taken advantage of
I'm starting to get a bit frustrated with your aggressive offers, but I'm willing to compromise. This is my last soft offer.
You're not going to get a better deal than this, so take it or leave it
I'm not going to get taken advantage of. I'll give you a slightly better offer, but don't expect any more generosity from me.
You're not serious about negotiating, so I'll take what's left
I'm not going to let you take advantage of me. I'll give you a small token, but I'm not going to give in to your demands.
You're not even going to give me a dollar? Fine, I'll take it all
I'm not going to let you take everything. I'll give you the entire amount, but only if you agree to give me nothing.
You're not getting the last laugh, I'm taking it all
